title: NFT Strike
author: NFT Strike
content: NFT STRIKE - SHOW YOUR SKILL IN COUNTER STRIKE AND EARN CRYPTONFT Strike is based on CS 1.6 and offers you a modern platform with game servers and a marketplace where you can earn NFTS tokens   MONETIZE YOUR UNUSED POWERPlayers have the opportunity to buy and sell weapons and character models on our marketplace, adding a new dimension to their gaming experience The weapons available for trade will have unique characteristics, such as ammo capacity, reload speed, and weight, introducing a new strategic layer to the gamePlayers can choose the perfect weapon to suit their playstyle and gain a competitive edge over their opponentsThis trading system not only enhances the gaming experience but also provides a way for players to earn real value from their in-game assetsBy selling unwanted weapons or character models, players can earn tokens that can be used to purchase other in-game itemsThis innovative marketplace feature empowers players to take control of their gaming experience and monetize their skills and assets, ultimately creating a more engaging and rewarding game worldUNLEASH THE POWER OF EARNINGSIf a player doesn’t have time to play, they can lease their power units to another playerThe lessee then earns more tokens for kills, while the lessor receives a percentage of those tokens  This leasing system provides an additional revenue stream for both players and investors. Players who may not have the time to actively participate in the game can still earn tokens by leasing their power units to other playersOn the other hand, players who lease these power units can maximize their token earnings, giving them an edge in the game Investors can also benefit from this system by investing in power units and then leasing them to playersThis not only provides a return on their investment but also contributes to the overall growth and success of the gameBy offering this innovative leasing system, we are creating a win-win situation for both players and investors, allowing them to maximize their earnings while enjoying the thrilling world of our gameNFT STRIKE MONETIZE GAMINGIn our game, players use power units (HP) similar to the concept of hash rate in cryptocurrency miningThese power units determine how many tokens a player can earnThe more power units you have, the more tokens you will receive for each in-game killFor example:If you don't have any additional power units, you will earn 1 token per killBut, if you have 10 power units, you will earn 10 tokens per kill By actively participating in the game and accumulating power units, players increase their potential to earn tokens,making their gaming experience not only entertaining but also rewardingNFT STRIKE LIMITED COLLECTIONWHAT IS COUNTER STRIKE NFTWe have curated a collection of 2500 unique NFT items that are popular among the Counter-Strike 1.6 communityPlayers can buy, sell, and trade these NFTs on our marketplaceADVANTAGES COUNTER STRIKE NFTThis NFT collection adds another layer of excitement and opportunity for playersBy owning these unique NFTs, players can showcase their dedication to the game and stand out from the crowdAdditionally, these NFTs can be traded or sold on our marketplace, allowing players to earn real-world value from their in-game achievements and assetsThis feature is not only a fun addition to the game but also a new way for players to monetize their gaming experiencePOWERED BY PROXIMA LAB GAMENFT Strike is the first game product from Proxima Lab Game Limited companyProxima Lab Game is an officially registered company in United Kingdom
